author: learn-build-service-prod[bot]
message:
Merge pull request #9535 from MicrosoftDocs/main

Auto Publish – main to live - 2025-08-29 22:04 UTC
ai_summary:
Here's a summary of the changes:

The documentation for **Lifecycle Workflows** has been updated to include an option for the "Remove all access package assignments for user" task, allowing administrators to specify a delay before assignments are removed. Additionally, the **Privileged Identity Management** documentation has been revised to clarify the process of assigning roles with administrative unit scope, particularly for custom roles. The date for this PIM article has also been advanced.

author: prmerger-automator[bot]
message:
Merge pull request #9534 from rolyon/rolyon-pim-assign-role-admin-unit-scope

[Entra PIM] Assign custom role with administrative unit scope
ai_summary: This commit updates a Microsoft Entra ID document concerning Privileged Identity Management. The `ms.date` metadata has been changed from August 11, 2025 to August 29, 2025. Additionally, the document now includes specific instructions for assigning custom roles with administrative unit scope, clarifying that this assignment must be initiated from within the administrative unit itself.

author: rolyon
ai_summary: This commit makes a minor correction to a documentation page regarding Privileged Identity Management (PIM). It updates a cross-reference link from "Add and remove administrative units" to "Create or delete administrative units" to ensure users are directed to the correct resource for managing administrative units. This ensures the documentation accurately reflects the process of assigning custom roles with administrative unit scope.

author: rolyon
ai_summary: This commit updates the documentation for Microsoft Entra ID's Lifecycle Workflows. Specifically, it enhances the description of the "Remove all access package assignments for user" task, informing users that they can now customise whether assignments are removed immediately or after a specified number of days. This is reflected in both the text and the accompanying screenshot, along with an update to the Microsoft Graph parameters to include the `daysUntilExpiration` argument.

author: rolyon
message: Assign custom role with administrative unit scope
ai_summary: This commit updates a Microsoft Entra Privileged Identity Management (PIM) how-to guide. The `ms.date` metadata has been changed from August 11, 2025, to August 29, 2025. Additionally, a clarification has been added regarding the assignment of custom roles with administrative unit scope, specifying that this must be done by first opening the administrative unit, not directly from the "Roles & admins" page.

author: James Barnett
message:
Merge pull request #9533 from OWinfreyATL/owinfreyATL-AccessPackageAssignmentBehavior-PublicPreview

Assignment package workflow Public Preview
ai_summary: This commit updates the documentation for "Lifecycle workflow tasks" in Microsoft Entra ID. Specifically, it enhances the description of the "Remove all access package assignments for user" task to include the ability to configure whether assignments are removed immediately or after a specified number of days. The commit also adds the `daysUntilExpiration` argument to the task's JSON configuration for Microsoft Graph.

author: Ortagus Winfrey
ai_summary: This commit updates the documentation for Lifecycle Workflow Tasks, specifically focusing on the "Remove all access package assignments for user" task. A new argument has been added, `daysUntilExpiration`, which allows for the configuration of the expiration period for these assignments. This enhances the flexibility and control over user access package management within the workflow.

author: Ortagus Winfrey
ai_summary: The commit updates the documentation for **Lifecycle Workflows** in Microsoft Entra ID. Specifically, it enhances the description for the "Remove all access package assignments for user" task. The change clarifies that users can now configure whether these assignments are removed immediately or after a specified number of days, and it also includes an updated JSON example demonstrating the inclusion of the `daysUntilExpiration` parameter.

Auto Publish – main to live - 2025-08-29 17:04 UTC
ai_summary: The updated documentation includes crucial changes to the Certificate-Based Authentication (CBA) section, specifically clarifying the handling of Certificate Revocation Lists (CRLs). Several files have been modified to accurately reflect the new link for CRL validation documentation and to update the technical deep-dive content regarding CRLs. Additionally, there are minor updates to the "What's New" archives and a file path correction within the Privileged Identity Management (PIM) documentation.

author: James Barnett
message:
Merge pull request #9329 from vimrang/CRLChanges

creating new CRL page
ai_summary: This commit primarily focuses on updating documentation related to Microsoft Entra's certificate-based authentication (CBA). It refactors and reorganises content about Certificate Revocation Lists (CRLs), moving detailed explanations to a new dedicated page (`concept-certificate-based-authentication-certificate-revocation-list.md`). The updates include clarifying the CRL process, improving guidance on CRL setup, and expanding the error reference section. Additionally, links have been updated across various documentation pages to reflect the new article structure.

author: vimrang
ai_summary:
This commit updates a documentation file regarding Certificate Revocation Lists (CRLs) for certificate-based authentication.

The change specifically corrects a minor typographical error in the heading, changing "CRL error eeference" to "CRL error reference". This ensures the clarity and accuracy of the technical documentation.

author: v-ccolin
message:
Merge pull request #9495 from barclayn/2025-august-pim-log-history

updating date
ai_summary:
This commit updates the documentation for viewing audit logs in Microsoft Entra Privileged Identity Management (PIM).

Two new image files, `resource-audit.png` and `my-audit.png`, have been added to illustrate the "Resource audit" and "My audit" views respectively.

The main Markdown file, `pim-how-to-use-audit-log.md`, has been modified to reflect these changes, including updated instructions, clearer descriptions of the audit views, and a change in the required sign-in roles for viewing resource audit history to include Global Administrator, Global Reader, Security Administrator, and Security Reader. The date of the article has also been updated.

author: prmerger-automator[bot]
message:
Merge pull request #9520 from msewaweru/sql-edition-change

Update SQL Server version in prerequisites
ai_summary: This commit updates the documentation for installing prerequisites for Microsoft Entra Connect. The primary changes include an update to the `ms.date` metadata, a correction to a hyperlink for TLS 1.2 support on SQL Server to use a relative path, and a downgrade of the Microsoft SQL Server components from version 2022 to version 2019 for local installations.
